Package Model

Interface IPiece

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Assassin, CompositePiece, GoldMerchant, Guard, Knight, LeaderPiece, Piece, PieceDecorator, Pikeman, RangedPiece, Shoes, SoldierPiece, Sword, Wizard
    public interface IPiece

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  IPiece.Type
      All possible piece types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getMoveDistance()
      Gets the move distance of the unit.
      int getPositionY()
      Gets the Y position of the piece.
      int getPower()
      Gets the power level of the unit.
      IPiece.Type[] getType()
      Gets the type(s) of the piece, usually just one but sometimes the piece has multiple types.
      boolean isDefensive()
      Gets whether the unit is in defensive mode or not.
      void setDefensive​(boolean defensive)
      Sets the units defensive state.
      void setPosition​(int endx, int endy)
      Updates the position of this piece.
